title: What Does the Alien Emoji Mean? Your Ultimate Emoji Guide

steps.title: It symbolizes extraterrestrial life.
steps.content: It symbolizes extraterrestrial life. The alien emoji depicts pop culture's most common interpretation of how alien life forms look. When someone is talking about extraterrestrial life, they may add this emoji to supplement their message. steps.title: It represents anything strange or otherworldly.
steps.content: It represents anything strange or otherworldly. Oftentimes, people may use this emoji to symbolize anything particularly odd, including weird behavior or phenomena. Aliens are strange and mysterious themselves, so the emoji is a great choice to represent anything unusual. steps.title: Yes, there are actually a ton of outer space emojis.
